column3: I approve of your usage of ascii line drawing.\n
haha thanks, but /usr/bin/tree gets the credit there :)\n

Nice. Everything that shortens the release process is a win, and splitting 32-bit/64-bit/source releases is something that we should have done a long time ago.

ACK
@saivann FYI see above - the list of released files for 0.10 will be slightly different than up until now for 0.9. This may require changes to the download page.\n
Any reason why the osx dmg is called '-osx' and not '-osx64' (or even -osx64-setup)?\n< /extremenitpicking >\n
@sipa no particular reason. For now, we only have one osx flavor, but I don't see any harm in making that flavor explicit in the filename either.\n
